source:
%%sql
-- Build comment_type_reference_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW service_user_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T3.case_number IS NULL
        THEN T1.ServiceDataID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS ServiceDataID, -- surrogate key
    T1.TicketID                     AS TicketID,
    T3.case_number                  AS CaseReference,
    T3.salutation                   AS Salutation,
    CONCAT(T3.firstname , ' ' , T3.lastname) AS FullName,
    T3.address1                     AS AddressLine1,
    T3.address2                     AS AddressLine2,
    T3.city                         AS AddressTown,
    T3.county                       AS AddressCounty,
    T3.postcode                     AS Postcode,
    T3.country                      AS AddressCountry,
    T3.organisationname             AS Organisation,
    T3.organisationtypename         AS OrganisationType,
    T3.typeofinvolvement            AS Role,
    T3.telephoneoffice              AS TelephoneNumber,
    T3.telephonemobile              AS OtherPhoneNumber,
    T3.fax                          AS FaxNumber,
    T3.email                        AS EmailAddress,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    to_timestamp(T3.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T3.case_number,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.email,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T3.organisationname,'.'),
            IFNULL(T3.typeofinvolvement,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID,
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T1.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "Casework" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_standardised_db.horizon_service_user T3 
    ON T3.case_number = T3.case_number 
        AND T1.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    (-- flags new data        
        (CASE
            WHEN T3.case_number = T1.CaseReference 
            AND md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(T3.case_number,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.email,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T3.organisationname,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T3.typeofinvolvement,'.')
                )) <> T1.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T1.ServiceDataID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    )
    AND T3.case_number IS NOT NULL
    AND T3.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_service_user);
;

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW service_user_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select
    ServiceDataID,
    TicketID,
    CaseReference,
    Salutation,
    FullName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From service_user_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    ServiceDataID,
    TicketID,
    CaseReference,
    Salutation,
    FullName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM service_user_dim_new WHERE ServiceDataID IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM service_user_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW service_user_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    ServiceDataID,
    TicketID,
    CaseReference,
    Salutation,
    FullName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM service_user_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim AS Target
USING service_user_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.ServiceDataID = Target.ServiceDataID

-- For Updates existing rows
WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (ServiceDataID,
        TicketID,
        CaseReference,
        Salutation,
        FullName,
        AddressLine1,
        AddressLine2,
        AddressTown,
        AddressCounty,
        Postcode,
        AddressCountry,
        Organisation,
        OrganisationType,
        Role,
        TelephoneNumber,
        OtherPhoneNumber,
        FaxNumber,
        EmailAddress,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.ServiceDataID,
        Source.TicketID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.Salutation,
        Source.FullName,
        Source.AddressLine1,
        Source.AddressLine2,
        Source.AddressTown,
        Source.AddressCounty,
        Source.Postcode,
        Source.AddressCountry,
        Source.Organisation,
        Source.OrganisationType,
        Source.Role,
        Source.TelephoneNumber,
        Source.OtherPhoneNumber,
        Source.FaxNumber,
        Source.EmailAddress,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive)

%%sql
-- Insert new SXOID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ServiceDataID NULLS LAST) AS ServiceDataID,
    TicketID,
    CaseReference,
    Salutation,
    FullName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim;
